author: psmith
msg: Made the WelcomePanel a singleton, makes no sense to dispose
/create  it all the time, and the added benefit is that

author: psmith
msg: added pluginNameExists method to allow Chainsaw (and other clients)
to determine if a specific plugin name is already in use.
Chainsaw uses this method to suffix an incrementing number
should the user try and reuse the name.

author: psmith
msg: Exposed as public the default ports for these two appenders.
Chainsaw really needs this so it has some default values for the user
when they wish to create a Receiver using the GUI.
Seems a safe change considering they are static final.

author: psmith
msg: Chainsaw is now built from the build target, but only if the ORO package
Also tweaked the way chainsaw starts so that it immediately fails
if ORO isn't found rather than going through the whole compile sequence.
Also removed chainsaw's dependancy on the LF5 jar target.
